thread.title: Carly Rae Jepsen & Lil Yachty's 'It Takes Two' Grammys Target Commercial: Watch | Billboard
thread.title_full: Carly Rae Jepsen & Lil Yachty's 'It Takes Two' Grammys Target Commercial: Watch | Billboard

author: Taylor Weather
title: Carly Rae Jepsen & Lil Yachty's 'It Takes Two' Grammys Target Commercial: Watch | Billboard
text:
COMMENTS Rachel Murray/Getty Images for Target Carly Rae Jepsen and Lil Yachty On-Set with Target for 'It Takes Two' Remake and Commercial to Air During 59th Annual Grammy Awards on Jan. 23, 2017 in Culver City, Calif. 
What do you get when you put a pop hitmaker, an up-and-coming rapper and one of the biggest retailers together? One fun commercial. 
As previewed a few days prior to the 59th annual Grammy Awards, Carly Rae Jepsen and Lil Yachty teamed up for a new Target ad featuring a new-and-improved version of Rob Base & DJ E-Z Rock's "It Takes Two." 
Starting off in a replica of a Target store's red checkout lanes, the red-and-white color scheme continued as Yachty and Jepsen sang their way through the ad spot that featured everything from emoji pillows to an aisle of Mr. Clean products (and of course, the beloved Target mascot Bullseye the dog). Oh, and Lil Yachty's red braids have never been more appropriate. 
Check out Jepsen and Yachty's full commercial below.
